issue.title: Add warning for Brave users
issue.body:
In v1, Brave introduced their native crypto wallet, which is rather intrusive and overrides Metamask.

Some users told me they would've loved to contribute to our [Sablier](https://gitcoin.co/grants/253/sablier) grant, but they couldn't because nothing happened after tapping the submit button. I jumped on TeamViewer to help them and it turned out that the issue was Brave - after disabling it, it went fine.

It'd be nice to display a warning for Brave users. Related: https://github.com/brave/brave-browser/issues/6053

It'd be nice to display a warning for Brave users. Related: https://github.com/brave/brave-browser/issues/6053

issue.title: DESIGN - Create a vector avatar for the Gitcoin avatar builder.
issue.body: I have some fun news. The Gitcoin avatar builder is about to get the ability to have MANY different avatar types on it. # 1 # 2 # 3 Starting with the release of the Bufficorn Avatar builder at ETHdenver 2020, we are going to be allowing MANY different avatar types onto the platform soon. ## How it works [Checkout these two sample avatar svgs](https://bits.owocki.com/v1umkr1e). If you open them up in your favorite SVG editor this is what youll see as the DOM structure Basically there are different categories of accessories.. And different permutations of that accessory.. And they are encapsulated as items in the DOM of the svg. ## Bounty Your task is to create an avatar concept for the avatar builder. To participate 1. Design an avatar from the request list below. 2. Post a sketch . 3. We'll chat about it; and I may invite you to post a full vector image of the avatar. 4. We'll chat about it; and I may invite you to post a full layer avatar file. The prize for a getting a full avatar file on the site will be 5 ETH. I will fund up to 5 of these in Q1 2020. ## Asks Here are some avatar styles that would be cool to add to the site: - Robot - Barbarian (think like Barbarian from Diablo Video Game) - Mage (think like Mage from Diablo Video Game) - Burning Man Participant - Orc (from Warcraft) - a wookie - a jedi - superhero / supervillian - Protoss (from Starcraft) - alien - Brooklyn Hipster - Rainbows/Unicorn Developer - Economist - Willy Wonkas Playground - pixel art avatars ## How to submit work Submit a PR to this directory https://github.com/gitcoinco/creative/tree/master/Product/Avatar on the gitcoin creative repo

issue.title: as a end user I would like to be able to livestream via my status updates on gitcoin, so i can record messages for my community.
issue.body:
<!--
Hello Gitcoiner!

Please use the template below for feature requests for Gitcoin.
If it is general support you need, reach out to us at
gitcoin.co/slack

-->

### User Story

[comment]: # (As a <user type>, I want to <task> so that <goal>.)
as a end user I would like to be able to livestream via my status updates on gitcoin, so i can record messages for my community.

### Why Is this Needed

[comment]: # (Describe the problem and why this task is needed. Provide description of the current state, what you would like to happen, and what actually happen)
*Summary*:
face to face builds more empathy than text

### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*:
feature

### Current Behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
no ability to go live/ record a livestream on site.

### Expected Behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
when a user goes to send a status update, they can also attach a livestream recording of themself.
1. when other useres scroll their feeds, itll show a video attachment preview in the 'post status update' module
2. the video is embedded and video can be played inline by viewers

### Definition of Done
[comment]: # (Any other information that would be useful, bullets are helpful.)
see above

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Any other information that would be useful, content, screenshots, etc.)

pls only apply if u can PR within 48 hours.  and also pls select a technology provider (youtube maybe???) that can be integrated to enable this

See also: https://github.com/gitcoinco/web/pull/5840

issue.title: ENS support for sending on gitcoin

labels.name: community proposal
labels.description: This is a community sourced proposal.

labels.name: good first issue
labels.description: This a good first issue for a community newcomer.

issue.body:
Add ens support in a shared.js function...

Use this function to add ens support for 
- kudos withdrawals. 
- tip sends
- kudos sends

on Gitcoin

issue.title: as a end user I would like to be able to attach preset memes to my status update on gitcoin, so i can share memes
issue.body:
<!-- 
Thank you for your pull request! Please review the requirements below, read through the contributor's guide, 
and ensure your pull request has fulfilled all requirements outlined by the Gitcoin Core team.
Have you read the contributors guide?: https://docs.gitcoin.co/mk_contributors/ 
-->

##### Description
- [X] build on top of #5832 - I'm based on  #5880 due to merge conflicts
- [X] add the ability to search gifs from giphy by keyword
![Home _ Gitcoin (1)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/660973/73341603-972ffa00-4242-11ea-8f7f-346d6c977f91.png)
- [X] user can select a gif from the list, and if they select it, it will be attached to the status update
![Home _ Gitcoin (2)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/660973/73341653-aca52400-4242-11ea-9fdb-0bbf0a513605.png)
- [X] gif will be shown on the status update.
![(1) Home _ Gitcoin](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/660973/73341752-e37b3a00-4242-11ea-8f45-8f6cf28b4a2a.png)

I've validated generate no conflict with links and youtube videos.

<!-- Describe your changes here. -->

##### Refers/Fixes
#5882

<!-- All PRs should be accompanied by tests! If you haven't added tests, please explain here. -->

issue.title: Favorites REST API (just Backend)
issue.body:
<!--
Hello Gitcoiner!

Please use the template below for feature requests for Gitcoin.
If it is general support you need, reach out to us at
gitcoin.co/slack

-->

### User Story

[comment]: # (As a <user type>, I want to <task> so that <goal>.)
As a user I want to be able to favorite bounties, kudos, users and grants to follow what interest me 
### Why Is this Needed

[comment]: # (Describe the problem and why this task is needed. Provide description of the current state, what you would like to happen, and what actually happen)
*Summary*:
Today is hard to track something that interest me if I didn't interacted with that in the past, even interacting, something need to change to receive a notification.
This will be integrated into the dashboard data (#4153) and will generate diff tickets for each UI integrations for each product areas (bounties, kudos, users/orgs and grants)

### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Feature
Create different endpoints to interact with favorites table. This table will be a table of relations between the favorite and the sourced data ID

**[Endpoints docs](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/18800/S1a626JH?version=latest)**
`GET api/v0.1/favorites/:type`
`POST api/v0.1/favorites/:type/:id`
`api/v0.1/favorites/:type/:id`

**Documentation**
The documentation of the endpoints is in postman https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/18800/S1a626JH?version=latest

### Current Behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
Doesn't exist

### Expected Behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
Having an REST API ready to integrate

### Definition of Done
[comment]: # (Any other information that would be useful, bullets are helpful.)
API tested 

### Data Requirements
[comment]: # (How will we measure the success of this feature? What kind of tracking is needed for this feature (clicks, impressions, flag)?)
When implemented the UI this can make easy the life of users to follow what interest them most, finding bounties or people will be an easy task
Increment use of the platform
Decrement frustration
Make gitcoin more personal

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Any other information that would be useful, content, screenshots, etc.)
https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/18800/S1a626JH?version=latest
This task is the very beginning and will be a final feature after design and front end work get done. 
With favorites new features will be possible, for example suggest favorite users when creating a bounty, follow up organizations new bounties, etc.

issue.title: Bump django from 2.2.4 to 2.2.10 in /requirements

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: python
labels.description: Pull requests that update Python code

issue.body:
Bumps [django](https://github.com/django/django) from 2.2.4 to 2.2.10.
Commits - [`b2c33a5`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/b2c33a57b3b98f1e90bbc2a2be2c5a6d814eed29) [2.2.x] Bumped version for 2.2.10 release. - [`c67a368`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/c67a368c16e4680b324b4f385398d638db4d8147) [2.2.x] Fixed CVE-2020-7471 -- Properly escaped StringAgg(delimiter) parameter. - [`96d6443`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/96d644312106337d714790cbedfcb227f0faa609) [2.2.x] Fixed timezones tests for PyYAML 5.3+. - [`813b33e`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/813b33eec4d3fef8c5c3d4bfbc6ac90a248680c6) [2.2.x] Added CVE-2019-19844 to the security archive. - [`e728612`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/e7286122b42d863bc1e97a846330cc63303f1c21) [2.2.x] Post-release version bump. - [`c494d90`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/c494d90c195a739a7298b073eaa6ed987c2fd0bc) [2.2.x] Bumped version for 2.2.9 release. - [`4d334be`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/4d334bea06cac63dc1272abcec545b85136cca0e) [2.2.x] Fixed CVE-2019-19844 -- Used verified user email for password reset r... - [`86befcc`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/86befcc172c23170a720b3e0c06db51a99b3da59) [2.2.x] Refs [#31073](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/django/django/issues/31073) -- Added release notes for 02eff7ef60466da108b1a33f1e4dc0... - [`f33be1e`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/f33be1e8ae2efbca5f209e2365fa35c2aaee340c) [2.2.x] Fixed [#31073](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/django/django/issues/31073) -- Prevented CheckboxInput.get_context() from mutating a... - [`e8b0903`](https://github.com/django/django/commit/e8b0903976077b951795938b260211214ed7fe41) [2.2.x] Fixed [#31006](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/django/django/issues/31006) -- Doc'd backslash escaping in date/time template filters. - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/django/django/compare/2.2.4...2.2.10)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=django&package-manager=pip&previous-version=2.2.4&new-version=2.2.10)](https://help.github.com/articles/configuring-automated-security-fixes) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/gitcoinco/web/network/alerts).

issue.title: Add metadata card
issue.body:
<!-- 
Thank you for your pull request! Please review the requirements below, read through the contributor's guide, 
and ensure your pull request has fulfilled all requirements outlined by the Gitcoin Core team.
Have you read the contributors guide?: https://docs.gitcoin.co/mk_contributors/ 
-->

##### Description

<!-- Describe your changes here. -->
![Home _ Gitcoin](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/660973/73144181-89bf1800-4068-11ea-9812-d94baa792a40.png)


1. parsing and shows metadata preview in the 'post status update' module
2. when the status update is posted, a card is displayed with the metadata info.

![Home _ Gitcoin (2)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/660973/73135327-59df2880-4006-11ea-87dc-285b8103acde.png)


##### Refers/Fixes

<!-- If this PR is related to a Github issue, please add a link here. -->
#5880
#5883 previous PR
##### Testing

<!-- All PRs should be accompanied by tests! If you haven't added tests, please explain here. -->
